item.description:
***Note: the start time may get adjusted to fit the needs of the group. I may also adjust the exact meeting location once I map out our route.***

I do not want to discourage anyone but this is a challenging hike.

Please do not hesitate to join if you like to push yourself physically. The goal is not to beat anyone else but to challenge and push yourself.

We will plan to cover about 7 miles in a few hours. This will require us to hike at a steady fast pace with some jogging (running) when possible. We will plan for one, maybe 2 breaks.

Please email me if you have any questions at all.

I encourage people to sign up, but I would like to emphasis that it is not a walk in the park.
item.name: MIddlesex Fells Skyline hike - fast pace
